description: Cash transfer application: enabling companies or organizations to deposit money en masse into electronic money accounts.
link-sent-to-email: <1>We have sent a reset link by e-mail to <1 className='text-primary'> {{email}} </1>. </1> <1>This link will allow you to create a new password securely.</1>
enter-email-address: Enter your email address to retrieve your account.
email-not-valid: Please enter a valid email address
email-not-correspond-to-user: This email address is not yet registered. Please register first.
identic-password-validation: Password confirmation must be identical to your password
create-new-password-description: Create a new password to retrieve your account
password-complexity-description: It is advisable to include the following elements:
password-complexity-lower: Use at least one lowercase letter
password-complexity-upper: Use at least one capital letter
password-complexity-specialChar: Use at least one special character (#[]()]$#*!?|,.^/\+_-)
password-reseted-description: your password has been reset successfully you can login again by clicking the back button.
login-again: Please log in again to continue your session.
